data.title: Good BBQ
data.text: Tried this place for the first time today. Ordered the pulled pork sandwich which comes with a side and dessert. Sandwich was huge!! Can be easily split between 2 people. My sandwich was lukewarm and kind of soggy. Mac and cheese was good, but wasn't warm. Their dessert that they are known for, the Fookie, is a cookie and fudge combined. It was pretty good. Customer service was great and the place was clean.

data.title: Birthday lunch
data.text:
My co-workers took me to Dobsons for lunch today and it was great food. The owner was very personable and very proud of his offerings. Took the opportunity to come talk with us and share with us more about the company. 

The food is top quality meats and smoked to perfection. You can't go wrong. 

The deserts he provides is house made fookies his special fudge cookies from scratch and delicious. The fudge is creamy and simply melts in your mouth. He was even kind enough to send a small box of fudge back to our co-workers who couldn't make the lunch. 

It's one of our new "places"

data.title: Bummed
data.text:
My husband and I are huge bbq fans so I figured I'd scout it out today and if good... Bring him back. Very friendly staff but food didn't hit the mark at all. I ordered baby back ribs but was served spare ribs. The ribs were VERY tough and very fatty poor quality. Could not even tear meat off the bone. Half the rub was inedible grisle and fat. What meat there was was super tough and not tasty. I just couldn't eat them. Not sure why I got spare ribs since baby backs were the only ribs on the menu.
The side ( Mac n cheese) was ok but not the gooey goodness I was hoping for.
They asked how I liked it and asked if these were spare ribs... They confirmed... And said since I wasn't a fan... They would bring some baby backs... But waited another 10 min and they never came.
I would try again just because they were friendly and I always root for mom and pop businesses. Would steer clear of ribs and try diff side. I am a little leery BC I'm not sure why they woul serve up such poor quality meat... Especially to a new customer.
Has anyone else liked something different?

data.title: Great smoked meats
data.text:
This cafe is small and friendly. Keep a watchful eye to find it the first time. The meat is well prepared and tasty.
I love the pulled pork and usually get it alacart. Desserts are different (they have a story) and wonderful.
There is a small outside patio..... a bit noisy w/traffic

data.title: Great ribs, nice people and service.
data.text: Went there this week to try the local bbq. The ribs were perfect, smokey, not too done, but came off the bone nicely. We also had pulled pork and tri tip. The tri tip was ok but not as good as I'd have liked. There was some smokey flavor but it was a little basic (but to another that might be how they want it). The sides were good; garlic mashed potatoes, mac and cheese, beans, and cole slaw. And the service was nice. I think it was the owner, he came out and said hello asked how the food was. The only reason I'm giving 4 stars was that the pulled pork was overcooked and drowned in sauce. It was too mushy for my taste and I'd prefer my pulled pork with sauce on the side but I maybe should've asked for it that way, I'm not sure. I'd go there again for the ribs and try the chicken as well. Glad to have a place like this near bye.

data.title: Fabulous BBQ
data.text: Simple and delicious. Excellent BBQ and take-out. You will enjoy this family owned business. The Dobsons have some great recipes. All nicely done.

data.title: Great bbq!
data.text: Came here for ribs for Memorial Day bbq party! The staff was awesome and totally hooked me up with pre smoked racks of ribs!! Delicious!!

data.title: Good BBQ in Rocklin!
data.text: Really enjoyed our take out order last night.  Lots of good bbq meat, ribs, tri tip & pulled pork.  I especially enjoyed the tri tip &  my husband really liked the ribs.  The sides were good as well.  Of course, the  Fookie was yummy!  The owner is very friendly & nice.  Rocklin folks need to try this place!

data.title: Awesome mix of decadent ends of the food spectrum
data.text: Crazy good home made fresh food, all desserts made in house specialty is a "Fookie" all bbq smoked on premises all fresh never frozen meats. Tri tip sweet smoky amazing flavor. up and down menu awesome
